title: Rise Of Don Song Lyrics Junga
stanzas:
Rise Of Don Song Lyrics From Junga Tamil Movie. Rise of Don or Junga Junga is a kind of theme song from "Junga" sung by Suraj Jagan, Siddharth Vipin and composed by "Siddharth Vipin". Rap  in Rise of Don song is sung by Emcee Jazz and small portion was sung by "Rockstar Ramani Ammal".

Here is Rise of Don Song Lyrics penned by Lalithanand

High class ladies and
gentlemen
introducing the brand new
fresh gangster in the town. 
Totally new trend
he'll make you bend makka.

yeah!! 
age 32 shirt 42
weight 82,
what you gonna do!!
sollunga ketpom

chennai gangu
naanga thaanda 
mooditu poda

center of chennai, junga.
sethukki kondai thannai, junga
meetka vanthaan mannai, junga
evan velvaan ivanai.

polamburaanga police
nadunguraanga rowdies
discount-il service
dariyalil darraagum parrys

junga.. 

ethukku yezhu colorula
rainbow rainbow
rendu coloruthaan po po

ethukku aala thokathaan
tempo tempo
cycle pothumda sambo

ethukku podanum sketchu
athukulla moonchila 
kudupaan punchu

ethukku podanum switchu
azhaga moon-lighta 
mudippan matchu

junga ...oh ..junga

vaayakatti vayiththa katti
vazhugira singa kutti
en peraandi vellakatti
velukka poraan roundu katti

son of Ranga
grandson of Linga
vanthutaanda junga
vanthutaanda junga.

kaatchi poiyaagum
kanavellaam meiyaagum.
manathil pasi vanthaal
un kanave unavaagum

nokkam irundhale
un thookam paranthodum
yaekkam yen nenje
ini thaekkam udainthodum
poraadu..

junga ...oh ..junga

center of chennai, junga.
sethukki kondai thannai, junga
meetka vanthaan mannai, junga
evan velvaan ivanai.

polamburaanga police
nadunguraanga rowdies
discount-il service
dariyalil darraagum parrys
